Reviews.Title: Worth the wait...
Reviews.Author: bruno4u2nv
Reviews.Content: My Original Car Alarm remote was damaged and I was going to replace everything, as in the Car Alarm System itself.  So, I was about to take everything apart due to every time I open my car the alarm goes off, when I mechanic friend of mine told me to search the web for the remote itself.  I started searching the internet for a replacement, when I came across this replacement car alarm remote for Python 990 Alarm System.  First of all good price and looks exactly the same as the original and it came with the clear but easy to do instructions.  Programming the remote was easy as 1 2 3, after trying once to program the remote,it programmed immediately, I was using it in no time.

Reviews.Title: Python 7701p Remote
Reviews.Author: James W
Reviews.Content: I ordered this remote to replace my previous remote for my Python 990 security alarm system for my car.  Previous remote performed well, and this replacement remote arrived in OEM packaging with programming instructions.  Note: If you are not the installer of the alarm system, Valet programming button may be a little difficult to find (it is a very small black button that looks like a trigger of some sort).  Overall this product is perfect in description and I am very happy with it.  Thank you to Amazon Prime for expedited 2-Day Shipping!

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: D. Keith
Reviews.Content: The remote was shipped in sealed OEM packaging with supplied instructions.  It was easy to pair to my system and works great. AAA+

Reviews.Title: Direct replacement! Brand new! Great Deal
Reviews.Author: costa coloduros
Reviews.Content: I bought this to work with my python 990 remote.  Works flawlessly.  Is an original Python piece and paired easily with my remote.  All functions worked perfect and even tells me when my car is on when i remote start it!!

Reviews.Title: I WIll Re-Rate This Poduct When I Finally Figure Out How To Program IT!!!
Reviews.Author: Ja
Reviews.Content: I purchased this remote 3 weeks ago and still have yet to figure out how to program it. Currently looking for a dealer to help me out. I will re-rate when i figure it out

Reviews.Title: Great Replacement
Reviews.Author: Jeff Peterson
Reviews.Content: Great replacement, had a button die on my old one.  Easy to program.  I should have replaced it sooner, factory replacement.

Reviews.Title: Excellent replacement for original remote
Reviews.Author: John Howell
Reviews.Content: The remote that came with the car when I bought it broke after being dropped occasionally during 2-3 years of use. Until then, it functioned flawlessly. The replacement was identical. The only difficulty was programming it to the car's system. After reading the instructions in the owner's manual and from the internet, I took the system to a local dealer who was able to program it quite easily.Regardless, the remote works great.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I needed
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: This remote is exactly like the one I had and for half the price of all other sites.  Word of caution:  the problem I had was with the remote not pairing with the main unit.  Since I did not install it and didn't want to tear the dash apart, I contacted the vendor who installed the unit and they paired it up.Other than that, not a single problem.

ProductInfo.Features:
Python responder SST remote - for Python 990 and 950
4 button
Backlight
ProductInfo.Name: Python 7701P Responder SST LCD HHU Remote
